script.title: DCM To BigQuery
script.description: Move existing DCM report into a BigQuery table.
instructions: Specify either report name or report id to move a report.
The most recent valid file will overwrite the table.
Schema is pulled from the official DCM specification.

field.name: report_id
field.description: DCM report id, empty if using name .

field.name: report_name
field.description: DCM report name, empty if using id instead.

field.name: dataset
field.description: Dataset to be written to in BigQuery.

field.name: table
field.description: Table to be written to in BigQuery.

field.name: is_incremental_load
field.description: Clear data in destination table during this report's time period, then append report data to existing table.
